thread.title: Report: Wegmans Latest Company to Face Trump-Related Boycott

title: Report: Wegmans Latest Company to Face Trump-Related Boycott

organizations.name: wegmans latest company to face trump-related boycott   just

text:
Report: Wegmans Latest Company to Face Trump-Related Boycott   Just now share 
A women's organization in Virginia is threatening to boycott Wegmans if the store doesn't stop selling Trump Winery products. Wegmans can't sell wine in New York State, but it's legal in Virginia. According to the Washington Post President Donald Trump purchased a winery in 2011. The Virginia chapter of the National Organization for Women has made plans to "pressure" Wegmans. Wegmans said it started selling the wine before Trump bought it and will continue to "offer customers choices." 
Read the full story HERE: WashingtonPost.com
